item.title: Half the Web Is Now Encrypted. That Makes Everyone Safer
item.description: Published: January 2017 URL: https://www.wired.com/2017/01/half-web-now-encrypted-makes-everyone-safer/ Abstract: Computer security news is usually pretty dismal. But today the web got safer in a very important way.

item.title: HTTPS-Everywhere for Government
item.description: Published: June 2015 URL: https://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/blog/2015/06/08/https-everywhere-government Abstract: Today, the White House Office of Management and Budget (OMB) issued the HTTPS-Only Standard directive, requiring that all publicly accessible Federal websites and web services only provide service through a secure HTTPS connection.

item.title: Policy to Require Secure Connections across Federal Websites and Web Services
